docs.snippet: David Cameron’s successor has said little about how her country will withdraw from the European Union, and tough decisions loom....
docs.lead_paragraph: David Cameron’s successor has said little about how her country will withdraw from the European Union, and tough decisions loom.

headline.main: Theresa May, Britain’s Prime Minister, Plays the ‘Brexit’ Waiting Game
headline.print_headline: Waiting to Choose Her Moment on ‘Brexit’

docs.snippet: A sickening drop in the pound signals that all the illusions around the vote to leave the European Union have been shattered, and that Britain will pay a price....
docs.lead_paragraph: A sickening drop in the pound signals that all the illusions around the vote to leave the European Union have been shattered, and that Britain will pay a price.

headline.main: For Britain’s ‘Brexit’ Bunch, the Party Just Ended
headline.print_headline: For ‘Brexit’ Promoters, Falling Pound Signals the Party’s Over

docs.snippet: The chancellor of the Exchequer promised to take “whatever steps are necessary to protect this economy” as the country prepares to leave the European Union....
docs.lead_paragraph: The chancellor of the Exchequer promised to take “whatever steps are necessary to protect this economy” as the country prepares to leave the European Union.
docs.abstract: Philip Hammond, Britain's chancellor of Exchequer, promises in address at annual Conservative Party convention that government will invest in infrastructure projects and will act to reduce any disruption that may result from country's exit from European Union; address comes in wake of tough immigration control speech given by Prime Min Theresa May, which caused concerns in financial markets.

headline.main: Hammond Addresses ‘Brexit’ Turbulence With Hints of Policy Shift
headline.print_headline: Britain Plans Economic Shift to Reduce ‘Brexit’ Fallout

docs.snippet: It is predicted that fewer pieces will come to market in Britain because of the weakened pound, but experts maintain that art will persevere as an asset class....
docs.lead_paragraph: It is predicted that fewer pieces will come to market in Britain because of the weakened pound, but experts maintain that art will persevere as an asset class.
docs.abstract: Britain’s referendum vote to leave European Union rattles auction houses preparing for contemporary art sales in London, with many questioning country's ability to weather devaluation of pound and rocky market; art world experts contend instability will pass and assert investments in art have historically proven to be safe.

headline.main: Brexit Casts Uncertainty on Art Market
headline.print_headline: Brexit Vote Casts Uncertainty on the Fate of Britain’s Art Market

byline.contributor: Scott Reyburn contributed reporting from London.

docs.snippet: Michael Gove, Britain’s justice secretary, said a campaign effort by Nigel Farage’s U.K. Independence Party “was the wrong thing to do.”...
docs.lead_paragraph: Michael Gove, Britain’s justice secretary, said a campaign effort by Nigel Farage’s U.K. Independence Party “was the wrong thing to do.”
docs.abstract: British justice Sec Michael Gove, advocate for country's exit from European Union, condemns anti-immigration poster circulated by UK Independence Party; concern grows ahead of referendum on EU membership that hard-line anti-immigration messages could go too far.

headline.main: Anti-Immigration Poster Denounced by a Top ‘Brexit’ Advocate
headline.print_headline: ‘Brexit’ Advocate Says Anti-Immigration Poster Goes Too Far

docs.snippet: Bystrany, a town in eastern Slovakia with a majority Roma population, has thrived in the past decade thanks to remittances from locals who grabbed the benefits of European Union membership and sought work in Britain....
docs.lead_paragraph: Bystrany, a town in eastern Slovakia with a majority Roma population, has thrived in the past decade thanks to remittances from locals who grabbed the benefits of European Union membership and sought work in Britain.

headline.main: Roma Fear Brexit to Bring Back Bad Times for Their Thriving Slovak Town
headline.print_headline: Roma Fear Brexit to Bring Back Bad Times for Their Thriving Slovak Town

docs.snippet: The European Parliament will not accept an agreement for Britain's exit from the European Union that would endanger any of the four EU freedoms, including the freedom of movement of people, parliament's negotiator Guy Verhofstadt said on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The European Parliament will not accept an agreement for Britain's exit from the European Union that would endanger any of the four EU freedoms, including the freedom of movement of people, parliament's negotiator Guy Verhofstadt said on Tuesday.

headline.main: EU Parliament Won't Accept Brexit Deal Threatening Four EU Freedoms
headline.print_headline: EU Parliament Won't Accept Brexit Deal Threatening Four EU Freedoms

docs.snippet: Prime Minister Theresa May set out plans to get big business behind her Brexit strategy on Monday, toning down plans to put workers on company boards and promising to spend billions of pounds on science, technology and research....
docs.lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Theresa May set out plans to get big business behind her Brexit strategy on Monday, toning down plans to put workers on company boards and promising to spend billions of pounds on science, technology and research.

headline.main: May Courts Business Seeking to Avoid Brexit Exodus
headline.print_headline: May Courts Business Seeking to Avoid Brexit Exodus

docs.snippet: Britain's vote to leave the European Union and the election of Donald Trump have transformed the world in a year, Prime Minister Theresa May said Monday, in a speech arguing that governments must heed people's concerns about the impact of globaliz...
docs.lead_paragraph: Britain's vote to leave the European Union and the election of Donald Trump have transformed the world in a year, Prime Minister Theresa May said Monday, in a speech arguing that governments must heed people's concerns about the impact of globalization on jobs and communities.

headline.main: May: UK Must Respond to World Transformed by Brexit, Trump
headline.print_headline: May: UK Must Respond to World Transformed by Brexit, Trump
